languages.text: "Почему же только себе, {name}?" {n}Маражай склоняется вперед.{/n} "Нам. Ведь ты же жаждал{mf||а} раскрыть тайны, что таит самое мое естество? Я предлагаю тебе расширить свои тесные границы — под моим чутким наставничеством".

"Why for only my amusement, {name}?" {n}Marazhai leans forward.{/n} "For our amusement. Haven't you been craving to uncover the secrets of my very nature? I am offering you the chance to expand your narrow horizons — under my painstaking tutelage."
languages.original_text: "Почему же только себе, {name}?" {n}Маражай склоняется вперед.{/n} "Нам. Ведь ты же жаждал{mf||а} раскрыть тайны, что таит самое мое естество? Я предлагаю тебе расширить свои тесные границы — под моим чутким наставничеством".

traits.locale_text: "Why for only my amusement, {name}?" {n}Marazhai leans forward.{/n} "For our amusement. Haven't you been craving to uncover the secrets of my very nature? I am offering you the chance to expand your narrow horizons — under my painstaking tutelage."

"Why for only my amusement, {name}?" {n}Marazhai leans forward.{/n} "For our amusement. Haven't you been craving to uncover the secrets of my very nature? I am offering you the chance to expand your narrow horizons — under my painstaking tutelage."

"Why for only my amusement, {name}?" {n}Marazhai leans forward.{/n} "For our amusement. Haven't you been craving to uncover the secrets of my very nature? I am offering you the chance to expand your narrow horizons — under my painstaking tutelage."

"Why for only my amusement, {name}?" {n}Marazhai leans forward.{/n} "For our amusement. Haven't you been craving to uncover the secrets of my very nature? I am offering you the chance to expand your narrow horizons — under my painstaking tutelage."

languages.text: “为何要仅仅供我自己取乐呢，{name}？”{n}玛拉斋靠了过来。{/n}“应该是供你我取乐才对。你不是一直都渴望了解我真正的本性吗？我现在给你这个机会。你可以在我的悉心指导下， 拓宽你狭隘的视野。”
languages.original_text: "Why for only my amusement, {name}?" {n}Marazhai leans forward.{/n} "For our amusement. Haven't you been craving to uncover the secrets of my very nature? I am offering you the chance to expand your narrow horizons — under my painstaking tutelage."

traits.locale_text: “为何要仅仅供我自己取乐呢，{name}？”{n}玛拉斋靠了过来。{/n}“应该是供你我取乐才对。你不是一直都渴望了解我真正的本性吗？我现在给你这个机会。你可以在我的悉心指导下， 拓宽你狭隘的视野。”

languages.text: 「俺が楽しむためだけってのはどういう意味だ、{name}？」{n}マラズハイは顔を近づける。{/n}「俺達が楽しむためだろう。俺様の本性の秘密を明かしたいとしつこく言っていたのはお前だろう？お前の狭い視野を広げる機会をくれてやろう。手取り足取り教え込んでやるよ」
languages.original_text: "Why for only my amusement, {name}?" {n}Marazhai leans forward.{/n} "For our amusement. Haven't you been craving to uncover the secrets of my very nature? I am offering you the chance to expand your narrow horizons — under my painstaking tutelage."

traits.locale_text: 「俺が楽しむためだけってのはどういう意味だ、{name}？」{n}マラズハイは顔を近づける。{/n}「俺達が楽しむためだろう。俺様の本性の秘密を明かしたいとしつこく言っていたのはお前だろう？お前の狭い視野を広げる機会をくれてやろう。手取り足取り教え込んでやるよ」

languages.text: «¿Por qué iba a divertirme solo yo, {name}?». {n}Marazhai se inclina hacia delante.{/n} «Para divertirnos. ¿No ansiabas descubrir los secretos de mi naturaleza? Te ofrezco la oportunidad de ampliar tus horizontes... bajo mi meticulosa tutela».
languages.original_text: "Why for only my amusement, {name}?" {n}Marazhai leans forward.{/n} "For our amusement. Haven't you been craving to uncover the secrets of my very nature? I am offering you the chance to expand your narrow horizons — under my painstaking tutelage."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué iba a divertirme solo yo, {name}?». {n}Marazhai se inclina hacia delante.{/n} «Para divertirnos. ¿No ansiabas descubrir los secretos de mi naturaleza? Te ofrezco la oportunidad de ampliar tus horizontes... bajo mi meticulosa tutela».

languages.text: « Il ne s'agit pas seulement de moi, {name}, {n}dit Marazhai en se penchant vers vous.{/n} Vous aurez vous aussi droit à votre part des réjouissances. Je sais bien que vous brûlez de percer les secrets de ma nature profonde, et je vous offre l'occasion d'élargir votre horizon par trop étriqué sous ma tutelle minutieuse. »
languages.original_text: "Why for only my amusement, {name}?" {n}Marazhai leans forward.{/n} "For our amusement. Haven't you been craving to uncover the secrets of my very nature? I am offering you the chance to expand your narrow horizons — under my painstaking tutelage."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne s'agit pas seulement de moi, {name}, {n}dit Marazhai en se penchant vers vous.{/n} Vous aurez vous aussi droit à votre part des réjouissances. Je sais bien que vous brûlez de percer les secrets de ma nature profonde, et je vous offre l'occasion d'élargir votre horizon par trop étriqué sous ma tutelle minutieuse. »

languages.text: "Warum nur zu meinem eigenen Vergnügen, {name}?" {n}Marazhai lehnt sich nach vorne.{/n} "Zu unserem Vergnügen. Sehnt Ihr Euch nicht danach, die Geheimnisse meines Wesens zu lüften? Ich biete Euch die Chance, die Engen Eures Horizonts zu erweitern – unter meiner hingebungsvollen Anleitung."
languages.original_text: "Why for only my amusement, {name}?" {n}Marazhai leans forward.{/n} "For our amusement. Haven't you been craving to uncover the secrets of my very nature? I am offering you the chance to expand your narrow horizons — under my painstaking tutelage."

traits.locale_text: "Warum nur zu meinem eigenen Vergnügen, {name}?" {n}Marazhai lehnt sich nach vorne.{/n} "Zu unserem Vergnügen. Sehnt Ihr Euch nicht danach, die Geheimnisse meines Wesens zu lüften? Ich biete Euch die Chance, die Engen Eures Horizonts zu erweitern – unter meiner hingebungsvollen Anleitung."

languages.text: "Neden yalnızca benim eğlencem olsun ki {name}?" {n}Marazhai, öne doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "İkimizin de eğlencesi için. Tabiatımın sırlarını keşfetmek için yanıp tutuşmuyor musun? Sana titiz gözetimim altında daracık ufkunu genişletme şansı sunuyorum."
languages.original_text: "Why for only my amusement, {name}?" {n}Marazhai leans forward.{/n} "For our amusement. Haven't you been craving to uncover the secrets of my very nature? I am offering you the chance to expand your narrow horizons — under my painstaking tutelage."

traits.locale_text: "Neden yalnızca benim eğlencem olsun ki {name}?" {n}Marazhai, öne doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "İkimizin de eğlencesi için. Tabiatımın sırlarını keşfetmek için yanıp tutuşmuyor musun? Sana titiz gözetimim altında daracık ufkunu genişletme şansı sunuyorum."
